Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Fielding Avenue
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes and due to police activity near 79th/Fielding Avenue.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Vincennes, then resume their normal route, due to police activity near 79th/Fielding Avenue.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: #6 Jackson Park Express are temporarily rerouted due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, due to severe weather conditions near Lake Shore Drive.

Northbound buses will operate via Lake Park/47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan, Balbo, then resume their normal route. 

Southbound buss will operate via Balbo/Michigan, Cermak, King Drive, 47th, Lake Park, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #35 31st/35th Temporary Reroute near 35th/Cottage Grove
